name: Untill They Stop (jam version)
description:
Use WASD to move and Z / LMB to attack.

The game was made for theBatya Game Jam 2021.2. Unfortunately, we didn't have time to finish it properly, so I'm publishing it as is. 

The idea of the game was to be a raid boss and defend against endless hordes of enemies (players) in search of your treasure. 

All the art for the game were done by my girlfriend.

What's missing: Sound, Proper intro, Bug fixes, Animation fixes, Dialogues, Two more kinds of attacks and so on.

Nonetheless I am happy we at least made it this far, it was out first Game Jam and we enjoyed it.

UPD: I finished the game.
